footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Shikanoin Heizou | Update Date: 08/06/2022 | Editor: Luno#1337

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Skyward Atlas (DPS)__ 
A general stat-stick and the Best-in-Slot weapon for Heizou when running a crit build. 

__Kagura’s Verity (DPS)__ 
Another strong option for Heizou and a competitor for Heizou’s Best-in-Slot weapon when its passive stacks up. 

__Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers (Support)__
A weapon which passive provides a strong buff, albeit only for one team member. Since the weapon passive limits the flexibility of rotations in order to be more optimally utilised, it is most advisable to run this weapon when playing an already rotation-strict team. 
** **

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Solar Pearl (DPS)__
A strong weapon with an equally good passive that, as a whole, works well with Heizou’s kit.

__Widsith (DPS)__
In quickswap, Widsith at high refinements has the ability to outperform Atlas/ Kagura’s Verity when its passive procs. However, due to the 30s cooldown, those weapons will still be better overall when factoring multiple rotations. 

__Mappa Mare (DPS)__ 
Not the strongest but still a decent F2P option should none of the gacha weapons be available to the player. 

__Prototype Amber (Support)__ 
Prototype Amber has the unique ability that aids teams without a healer with its micro-heals. Its passive also helps to reduce ER requirements significantly, which is best utilized in teams where he can only get off one skill use with each burst; although the value of this greatly depends on if the player has his C4 already as it provides a large reduction to his energy needs.
** **

fields.value: 4 Viridescent Venerer is the best artifact set by far for Heizou. In teams that already have an anemo running the 4-piece set or monogeo/ anemo team compositions, running 2-piece set combinations on Heizou is an option.
